item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, October 7, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Ireland slams Israel’s ‘outrageous’ demands to its peacekeepers
2. Sue Gray quits as Number 10 chief of staff as Keir Starmer overhauls team
3. Regeneron head says weight-loss drugs could cause ‘more harm than good’
4. Anxious Europeans hoard savings as US consumers boost global economy
5. China demands schoolteachers hand in their passports
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, October 7, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
